name: UsedPhone
technology: React, Firebase, MongoDB, Vercel, NodeJS, ExpressJS,Tailwind, DaisyUI, Dotenv
overview: ❖ By using UsedPhone website, users can buy or sell used products payment gateway
❖ After booking, buyer can buy products and can pay through Stripe.
❖ Seller can Add Product, See all his buyers, all his products.
❖ There have 3 different dashboard panel (Buyer/ Seller / Admin).
❖ Admin can see all sellers, all buyers, reported items, delete and verify buyer and seller.
❖ Admin Access (user: munna@gmail.com password: 123456Use#)

name: saifuddinahammed-monna
technology: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap,React, Firebase,  Vercel, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Tailwind
overview: ❖ Homepage: A welcoming introduction to the portfolio and its owner, showcasing their skills and expertise.
❖ About: A section that provides a brief biography of the portfolio owner, including their work history, education, and any relevant accomplishments.
❖ Skills: A list of the owner's technical and non-technical skills, highlighting their areas of expertise.
❖ Projects: A showcase of the owner's past and current projects, with descriptions and images/media.
❖ Contact: A form or information for how to reach the owner, such as an email address or phone number.
❖ Blog (optional): A section for the owner to write about their thoughts and experiences, and to provide insights into their work and industry.
❖ Footer: A section that includes links to social media profiles, as well as any relevant disclaimer or copyright information.
